description: Standing female figure looking down to the left and holding up her robes at the waist with her left hand. Her outermost robe features a design of blue morning glories and a trellis, on a white and ochre ground. Her underrobes are yellow and green.
medium: Ink, color, and shell white on paper
signed: Nihon giga Kaigetsudo matsuyo_ (linage of  Kaigetsudo ) Doshu zushi
title: Standing prostitute wearing a kimono decorated with morning glories on a trellis
